Initial.title: Locha Mesh
Initial.subtitle: The Locha Mesh is an off-grid resilient network for communications, Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies payments, and data transmission without Internet.
Initial.text: Do you want to create a new account or restore a previously used account?
Initial.subTitleCreateAccount: Make sure to properly store your backup phrase in case you need to restore from it
Initial.subTitleCorfirm: Confirm your backup phrase to continue
Initial.subtitlePin: It is very important that you remember the PIN entered, with it you will have access to your account.
Initial.subtitlePin2: Enter your PIN to access your account
Initial.error2: You need to fill out all fields
Initial.error3: The words don't match, please check them and try again
Initial.subtitleRestore: To restore your account with a backup phrase enter the words in the correct order.
Initial.restorePinText: Enter the backup phrase to restore your PIN
